name: Red Vox Logo Disc Display
desc:
This is a display piece for the band [Red Vox](https://www.redvoxband.com/).

This is the first piece I made, and it started out as me just trying to learn Blender.

I initially had the idea to make the pieces slot together to make it easy to assemble, and started experimenting from there.
short_desc: This is a display piece for the band Red Vox.
